greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n mod (spf(n+1)+1), where spf(n) is the smallest prime factor of n (A020639).
comment: a(n) = n iff n+1 is prime: a(A006093(k))=A006093(k).
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 22 2003
